Introduction

SPIA was a South Korean girl group under Campus Entertainment. They officially debuted on April 2, 2024 with the digital single "Daddy's Little Girl".

SPIA is derived from the Chinese characters for ‘tree (shù)’ (樹), ‘spreading wings (Pī)’ (翍), and ‘beautiful (예쁠 아)’ (娥), collectively translating to “a beautiful fairy spreading wings among the trees.” The group aspires to showcase its unique charm within the 5th generation of girl groups, captivating audiences with their charisma and enchanting performances.

On September 10, 2024, it was announced that Hana would be leaving SPIA due to health issues, leaving SPIA as a four-member group.
